issue.title: Joint velocity can not be controlled using SetVelocity()

content.raw:
In rev fc620a7, the joints are controlled using PID controllers on joint angular position, I could not control the velocity using the velocity Controllers. Maybe because the nature of the velocity controlling is more difficult than position controlling and I could not find its correct PID values. 
Finally I could not control the velocity, so I approximated the joints position based on the input effector target velocity and control the position. I don't know if this solution is correct and it needs more test.
In this version the robot only executes the head movements command and simulator keeps the position of the other joints to be zero, 
as a test, in play_on, the simulator sets new arm position for the robot to move down its arms.
